summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3986 for the improvement of Erie Avenue from Yesler Way to a point approximately 200 feet south of the south margin of East Alder Street, (south end of existing bridge) by grading and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 48479, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
